title: ☑️ Ensure Workflow retry policy catches relevant errors only
description: retryStrategy is an optional field of the Workflow CRD that provides control over how to retry a workflow step. One of its fields is retryPolicy, which defines the policy of NodePhase statuses that will be retried (NodePhase is the condition of a node at the current time).
